summary: Implemented a build-version generation script and runtime logic to stamp a generated BUILD_VERSION into the `meta[name="app-version"]` tag, but the diff does not show any change ensuring the HTML meta tag is updated at build time as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: The generated build has a different app version identifier than the previous build (the HTML meta tag `app-version` is updated at build time).
missing_requirements.reason: While a build-time script generates a version and writes it to `.env.local` and a generated TS module, the diff does not include any change to the HTML template (e.g., `index.html`) to set/update the `meta[name="app-version"]` content at build time. The only shown mechanism is runtime stamping via `stampBuildVersion` on app startup.

hallucinated_features.description: Added project tracking metadata (`project_state.json`) describing feature requests/status.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a rebuild/cache-busting mechanism; it does not request adding or updating a project state tracking file.
